description: An envTemeratureNotification is sent if the
environmental monitoring detects that the temperature
is at a critical state. This may cause the system to
shut down. This notification is sent only if
envEnableTemperatureNotification is set to true.
The Average value of the temperature sensors.
variables.name: ENVIRONMENT-MIB::nnenvTempSensorValue

description: The Average status of the temperature sensors.
variables.name: ENVIRONMENT-MIB::nnenvTempSensorState

description: An envFanNotification is sent if the environmental
monitoring detects that a fan is in a critical state.
This may cause the system to shut down. This
notification is sent only if envEnableFanNotification
is set to true.
The index to access an entry in the table.
variables.name: ENVIRONMENT-MIB::nnenvFanUnitIndex

description: The current state of fan 0, normal/fail.
variables.name: ENVIRONMENT-MIB::nnenvFanState

description: An envPowerNotification is sent if the environmental
monitoring detects that a power supply has changed status.
This notification is sent only if
envEnablePowerNotification is set to true.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ENVIRONMENT-MIB::nnenvPowerSupply1DownNotification ENVIRONMENT-MIB::nnenvPwrsupPowerFailCount i 9999 ENVIRONMENT-MIB::nnenvPwrsupIndex i 1 ENVIRONMENT-MIB::nnenvPwrsupInstalled i 1 ENVIRONMENT-MIB::nnenvPwrsupStatus i 1 ENVIRONMENT-MIB::nnenvPwrsupType i 1 ENVIRONMENT-MIB::nnenvPwrsupUptime i 9999 ENVIRONMENT-MIB::nnenvPwrsupDowntime i 9999

description: Number of failures of either power supply
since boot-up.
variables.name: ENVIRONMENT-MIB::nnenvPwrsupPowerFailCount

description: Index to access entry.
variables.name: ENVIRONMENT-MIB::nnenvPwrsupIndex

description: Power supply installed flag.
variables.name: ENVIRONMENT-MIB::nnenvPwrsupInstalled

description: Power supply up/down status.
variables.name: ENVIRONMENT-MIB::nnenvPwrsupStatus

description: Power supply type.
variables.name: ENVIRONMENT-MIB::nnenvPwrsupType

description: Seconds since power supply came up.
variables.name: ENVIRONMENT-MIB::nnenvPwrsupUptime

description: Seconds since power supply went down.
variables.name: ENVIRONMENT-MIB::nnenvPwrsupDowntime
